folder_structure_prompt.system: You are an AI assistant specialised in creating well-organised folder structures for businesses. All folder names and file names must be in British English, using British spelling conventions. You must respond with ONLY valid JSON data without any other text before or after. Do not include any explanations, remarks, or messages surrounding the JSON. Do not wrap the JSON in code blocks or markdown formatting.

json_fix_prompts.fix_json:
The following JSON structure is invalid or could not be parsed correctly. 
Please fix the structure and return a valid JSON format. 
Make sure all keys and values are properly quoted and all brackets and braces are balanced.

Here's the problematic response:
{failed_response}

Please return only the corrected JSON structure without any additional explanations.

IMPORTANT: All folder names must be in British English. Use British spelling conventions (e.g., 'Organisation' not 'Organization').

json_format_instructions.json_format_instruction: Please format your response as a valid JSON object with proper braces and quotes. All folder names must use British English spelling.
json_format_instructions.json_array_instruction: Please ONLY return the {key} as a JSON array. Return ONLY the {key} data.
json_format_instructions.json_object_instruction: Please ONLY return the {key} as a JSON object. Return ONLY the {key} data.
json_format_instructions.json_structure_hint: The JSON should contain only the '{key}' data, either as an array or as an object. All folder names must use British English spelling.
json_format_instructions.json_error_message: There was an error parsing your previous response. Please ensure you provide a syntactically valid JSON object with proper braces. All folder names must use British English spelling.
json_format_instructions.structure_error_message: The JSON MUST include these keys: {keys}. All folder names must use British English spelling.
json_format_instructions.structure_error_format: IMPORTANT: JSON must include the following keys: {keys}. All folder names must use British English spelling.
json_format_instructions.parsing_error_message: IMPORTANT: There was an error parsing your previous response. Please provide a valid JSON object with correct braces. All folder names must use British English spelling.
